## ItemPublishableFieldDefinition type

Abstract base class for Item Field Definitions for the field types that can be published.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ItemPublishableFieldDefinition = ItemFieldDefinition & {
    IsIndexable?: boolean;
    IsPublishable?: boolean;
};
```

**References:** [ItemFieldDefinition](./open-api-client.itemfielddefinition.md)
